channel.title: Members on YiLab
channel.description: Recent content in Members on YiLab

item.title: Prof. Keke Yi
item.description: I’m a group leader of soil-plant interaction at the Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning (IARRP) from the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS). My group is working with the molecular mechanism of Pi uptake and homeostasis in plants. We are also interested with how the plants sense the external nutrition availability to modulate growth. Research Interests: Function and Evolution of Phosphate Transporter Plant nutritions Cell and Develpment Biology Education: 2005/10 - 2008/10, PhD in Cell and Develpment Biology, John Innes Centre / University of East Anglia 1997/09 - 2000/07, MS in Plant Science, Zhejiang University 1993/09 - 1997/07, BS in Plant Science, Zhejiang University Contact: Email: yikeke@gmail.

item.title: Dr. Wenyuan Ruan
item.description: Research Interests: Crop Science Mineral nutrition associated shoot architecture and crop yields Mechanisms of mineral nutrition sensing, uptake, translocation, and utilization Crosstalk of mineral nutrition signaling and homeostasis Education: 2011-2014, PhD in Biochemistry and molecular biology, Zhejiang University 2008-2011, MS in Plant Science, Jilin University 2004-2008, BS in Biological Engineering, Hebei University of Science and Technology Contact: Email: ORCID:
